content: Hi, I'm having some issues with my account. I keep getting error messages when trying to log in.
I apologize for the inconvenience. Can you please provide me with more details about the errors you're seeing?
It's been happening every time I try to access my account online, and it just says 'Authentication failed'.
I'd like to help you troubleshoot this issue. Can you please check your email address and password to ensure they are correct?
Yes, I've double-checked both of them, but I'm still getting the same error.
In that case, I'd like to escalate this issue to our advanced support team. Can you please provide me with your order number so we can look into this further?
